mapper.select: select player_id, player_name, player_height, player_weight, player_ave_score, player_ave_rebound, player_ave_assist, player_times, player_team, player_number from matchsys.player where player_id = #{playerId}

select player_id, player_name, player_height, player_weight, player_ave_score, player_ave_rebound, player_ave_assist, player_times, player_team, player_number from matchsys.player limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into matchsys.player(player_name, player_height, player_weight, player_ave_score, player_ave_rebound, player_ave_assist, player_times, player_team, player_number) values (#{playerName}, #{playerHeight}, #{playerWeight}, #{playerAveScore}, #{playerAveRebound}, #{playerAveAssist}, #{playerTimes}, #{playerTeam}, #{playerNumber})
mapper.update:
update matchsys.player
player_name = #{playerName},
player_height = #{playerHeight},
player_weight = #{playerWeight},
player_ave_score = #{playerAveScore},
player_ave_rebound = #{playerAveRebound},
player_ave_assist = #{playerAveAssist},
player_times = #{playerTimes},
player_team = #{playerTeam},
player_number = #{playerNumber},
where player_id = #{playerId}
